column1: The Purple Pig////Most plates are meant for sharing
column2: and depending on how hungry you are
column3: 2-3 plates per person is usually plenty.  This time my friend and I shared the butternut squash soup
column5: the bone marrow and the chicken thigh kebabs.  Everything was amazing.  I'd say the chicken was probably the most outstanding dish.  I've honestly had about 1/2 the items on the menu here and never been disappointed. My only dilemma is being torn from ordering favourites from last time and trying something new.
